meanings.definition: A type of Scottish dance tune.
meanings.sent1: The musicians played lively strathspeys at the ceilidh.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to traditional strathspeys during Scottish festivals.
meanings.sent3: The cat started dancing to the strathspeys playing on the radio.
meanings.sent4: The strathspeys filled the room with a joyful melody.
meanings.sent5: The strathspeys echoed through the hills, enchanting all who heard.

meanings.definition: A type of Scottish dance characterized by a slow tempo and dotted rhythms.
meanings.sent1: The dancers gracefully moved to the rhythm of the strathspeys.
meanings.sent2: The strathspeys at the Highland gathering were mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent3: The penguin tried to waddle in time with the strathspeys music.
meanings.sent4: Her heart beat to the slow strathspeys of the music, calming her nerves.
meanings.sent5: The strathspeys floated in the air, carrying the dancers in a dreamlike state.
